reviewTitle: Most effective and efficient Woofer(Party Speaker) that any one can obtain.
reviewDescription: I ordered this party speaker because I was finding a Multi feature device and I came across Krisons 4" SilverStar Double Woofer 30W Multi-Media Bluetooth Party Speaker. At first I was skeptical regarding it's usage and quality as I ordered it at the price of 1500 rupees but exceeding my expectations, it was the best choice that I made in a while. Before this speaker( woofer), I ordered a BOAT Speaker at a cost of 2000 rupees but it's semiconductor chip got fried and till now I am not able to fix it as the availability of the chip is minimal.Coming to it's quality* Made of hard plastic* Lightweight* Design is slick and attractive* Affordable in this particular segment* Buttons are smooth and durable* Has padding in it's bottom* Has a holding area* Size is quite decentSound Quality* Has stereo effect* Truly has loud sound* Singing along with it is perfect( alignment of voice and music is excellent)* Remote works properly* Mic is decent( you have to keep your mouth close to the receiver)* Fm catches all the necessary frequencies* RGB lights are fabulous* Battery backup is impressive( 3.5- 4 Hours)* Charging Time: 3-3.5 Hours* Type C charger* Background music is clear and up to the mark* Covers the entire house with perfect pitch* When taken outside and played at full volume, it covers a considerable areaNOTE: BEST FOR PARTY ATMOSPHERE AND DECENT SPACE.  BOTH THE WOOFERS  EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS.  HAS DECENT BASS
variant: Colour: SILVERSTAR_1, Pattern Name: Speaker

reviewDescription: The KRISONS is a powerhouse of a Bluetooth speaker that delivers exceptional sound quality, impressive battery life, and a durable design.*Sound Quality:*The KRISONS has 40W of power, which is impressive for its size. The sound quality is crystal clear, with deep bass and crisp treble. The double woofer cylinder design provides a rich, immersive audio experience that's perfect for music, movies, and gaming.*Battery Life:*With up to 7 hours of playback time, the KRISONS is perfect for outdoor gatherings, picnics, or camping trips. The battery life is impressive.*Design and Build:*The KRISONS has a sleek, cylindrical design that's both stylish and durable. The speaker is built to last, with a rugged exterior that can withstand rough handling.*Additional Features:*The KRISONS comes with a microphone.*Verdict:*The KRISONS is an exceptional Bluetooth speaker that offers outstanding sound quality, impressive battery life, and a durable design. If you're looking for a reliable, high-performance speaker that won't break the bank, the KRISONS is an excellent choice.- Exceptional sound quality- Impressive battery life- Durable design*Recommendation:*If you're looking for a high-quality Bluetooth speaker that offers excellent sound quality and impressive battery life, the KRISONS is an excellent choice.
